product_name: K2 Northern Lite Splitboard Package - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Built for women explorers, the K2 Northern Lite Splitboard package is a lightweight all-mountain splitboard built to charge up and down the steeps. Kit includes splitboard hardware and pre-cut skins.
short_description: Built for women explorers, the K2 Northern Lite Splitboard package is a lightweight all-mountain splitboard built to charge up and down the steeps. Kit includes splitboard hardware and pre-cut skins.
